content: free crochet pattern triple ripple dishcloth i really like this dishcloth pattern i find myself going back to it over and over - the ripples really help to scrub whether you re scrubbing backs dishes or chubby little faces triple ripple dishcloth materials 1 1/2 oz worsted wt cotton yarn sz g or h crochet hook approx 9 x 7 inches i never liked ripples until i tried this stitch you only need to count to three - all the stitches are done in groups of three size g hook was used in models special stitches blo- back loop only all stitches in this dishcloth are done in the back loop of the stitches only do not go through both loops or the ripples will not have ridges dc3tog- double_crochet three stitches together to make yo insert hook in next st yo and pull up loop yo and draw through two loops on hook 3 times yo draw through all 4 loops on hook two loops on hook 3 times yo draw through all 4 loops on hook dc3tog made directions chain 43 work all stitches in blo row 1 in blo double_crochet in 3rd chain from hook double_crochet in next 3 chain dc3tog 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 chs 3 double_crochet in next chain 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 chs repeat across row 2 double_crochet in last chain turn row 2 chain 3 in blo double_crochet in same st double_crochet in next 3 dcs 3dctog 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 dcs 3 double_crochet in next double_crochet 1 double_crochet in each of next 3 dcs repeat acros row 2 double_crochet in last double_crochet turn row 3-14 repeat row 2 end off work in all ends ©2000 please note all of my patterns are free for your use you may print out as many as you wish and i encourage you to share with friends please keep my name and copyright mark with all my patterns please do not post this to any email list and please don t post this on any other website feel free to link directly to any of my pages - drop me a line if you do
